amendment.description: Amendment authorizes certain amendments to be considered during consideration of H.R. 2160.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to permit Mr. Cox (CA) to offer an amendment to the bill H.R. 2160 regarding assistance to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the bill H.R. 2160.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 269 - 160 (Roll no. 305).

Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Amendment modified to make in order an additional amendment to the bill H.R. 2160, if offered by Mr. Wynn, printed as amendment No. 35 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1997.
On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
